thread.title: Sushant Singh Rajput starts training for Chandamama Door Ke
thread.title_full: Sushant Singh Rajput starts training for Chandamama Door Ke

author: IANS
title: Sushant Singh Rajput starts training for Chandamama Door Ke
text:
Sushant Singh Rajput starts… Sushant Singh Rajput starts training for Chandamama Door Ke After wrapping up the schedule of Dinesh Vijan's Raabta, actor Sushant Singh Rajput has started training for his upcoming Bollywood space film titled "Chanda Mama Door Ke". By IANS | Updated: January 17, 2017 7:14 pm Was Sushant Singh Rajput’s fallout with Aditya Chopra the real reason why he mocked Ranveer Singh’s Befikre? 
After wrapping up the schedule of Dinesh Vijan’s Raabta, actor Sushant Singh Rajput has started training for his upcoming Bollywood space film titled “Chanda Mama Door Ke”. Sushant on Tuesday shared a video of himself in the cockpit of an aircraft Boeing 737. “Excitement at its peak!! Chandamama door ke. #TrainingDay 1 #Boeing 737 fixed base simulator. #flyhigh @sanjaypchauhan @vikirajani,” Sushant captioned the video that he shared on his Twitter handle this evening. Sushant will reportedly be playing an astronaut in Sanjay Puran Singh Chauhan’s directorial. Other details about the space adventure film are still under wraps. (ALSO READ: Shahid Kapoor, Mira Rajput, Sushant Singh Rajput and Harshvardhan Kapoor pose for a cool selfie ) 
Sushant’s last film MS Dhoni: The Untold Story was a massive hit at the box office. the film received rave reviews from audience and critics alike. Not just that, the film went on to become one of the blockbuster hits of 2016. The 30-year-old actor was recently in news for his tiff with film maker Aditya Chopra. Apparently, Aditya Chopra replaced him with Ranveer Singh in Befikre. The actor has rcently returned from his New Year getaway with rumoured girlfriend Kriti Sanon. A pic of Sushant and Kriti from their London vacation went viral on social media but neither of the have yet commented on the same. Excitement at its peak!!
